channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
channel.description:
# [color=lighblue]The Chamberlain (Blue Dragon Killer)[/color]
*Passive: Royal Support - As a Senior Officer of the Royal House, you can step up as King.*
**Night Ability 1: Undisturbed (3 uses)** You will stay in your room tonight and attack anybody that might disrupt you. *Notes: Anybody using an ability that causes an effect, this includes: Occupying, Attacking, Converting. Also does bypass Immunity.*
**Day Ability 1: Doctrine (1 use)** You will send a Public Announcement to everyone as The Chamberlain.
**Day Ability 2: Smithy (1 use)** Your next usage of Undisturbed will be stronger and will kill every visitor.
# [color=purple]The Exiled (Unseen Offensive)[/color]
*Passive: Former Royalty - With a background as a Senior Officer, you can step up as King.*
**Night Ability 1: Disturbed (2 uses)** You will disturb your target and falsify your targets actions and results tonight.
**Night Ability 2: Banished (2 uses)** You will hide the Class of the Assassin's next kill.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
I’ve removed the initial two classes as I’ve reworked Volunteer and Untrained…

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

Then you should aim to become King and let Mastermind convert somebody new… hence why I gave it that Passive.

Agreed. You are correct.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Then you should aim to become King and let Mastermind convert somebody new… hence why I gave it that Passive.

Disturbed getting 2 uses is enough, because if you know who the Sheriff is, you can trick him into thinking he found Unseen or an Unseen is actually NS. Anymore uses and it’s just going to be overpowered to the point you can just use it on Sheriff every night.
Same goes for Banished. Hiding the Class of the Assassin’s next kill. Plus, counteract this with the fact that Assassin could hit an immune, which would waste the ability. So you must know when to use it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Yes. my concern is not balance in saying that; it is that you get bored after 4 nights with that role.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Do you even see the power that it has?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
JammySplodge:

congratulations you can count

I am pointing out that it is a low amount of abilities. Whenever I make a suggestion, and it only has 4 nights of abilities, you and plex say that is terrible for that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
exiled only has 4 nights of abilities.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
There, I made sure to specify

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: Bounty
item.description:
Does he bypass night immunity ? Nothing happens if he attacks mastermind. Not a fan of the chamberlain.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
That brings the whole “vet bait” into play.

Would you really try to convert a Chamberlain revealing himself?

Plus, wouldn’t you save something like that for the late stage where everyone is trying to work out who’s converted? The Converted version doesn’t have an announcement ability

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Welp, declare you are chamberlain, alert, ggwp.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Essentially, I would almost compare it to Veteran.

But also, to the Self Confirming, ToL has conversions, so ‘confirming’ yourself would most likely get you converted or people may doubt you later.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
ThePlex:

The Chamberlain

So it is a veteran with self confirming and a use to kill all visitor that visit you?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Chamberlain - The Exiled
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Sending a quick Bump because I just added my two other Classes

@Hippolytus you wanted this

Read full topic
